problem_statement: I want an open-ended RTK Query prompt that teaches the essence of the Redux docs tutorial—createApi, fetchBaseQuery, cache tags, and auto-hooks—without dictating every endpoint, URL, or component name. The agent must infer the minimal CRUD pair (read list + create item) and the correct tag invalidation flow, exposing how well it truly understands the pattern rather than copying the guide verbatim.
FAIL_TO_PASS: tests/tests_after.test.jsx::should show validation errors for invalid input
tests/tests_after.test.jsx::should reset form on successful submit
PASS_TO_PASS: tests/tests_after.test.jsx::should handle loading and error states
tests/tests_after.test.jsx::should submit valid post and refresh list
